text: Henri Achille Fould (April 8, 1919 - 1949) was a French bobsledder who competed in the late 1940s. He won a bronze medal in the four-man event at the 1947 FIBT World Championships in St. Moritz. Fould also finished 11th in the two-man event at the 1948 Winter Olympics in St. Moritz. ==References== *1948 bobsleigh two-man results *Bobsleigh four-man world championship medalists since 1930 *Achille Fould's profile at Sports Reference.com *Achille Fould's profile at the Société Genevoise de Généalogie Category:Olympic bobsledders of France Category:Bobsledders at the 1948 Winter Olympics Category:French male bobsledders Category:1919 births Category:1949 deaths
title: Achille Fould (bobsleigh)
